samples.ui
Class TextBox

java.lang.Object
  samples.ui.Component
      samples.ui.ScrollableComponent
          samples.ui.TextBox

public class TextBox
extends ScrollableComponent

This class implements a text box that can hold and displays multiple rows of text. Text is broken along word boundaries.

          The combined left and righ margin of a text box.
